page.title: 19VILLAGE CHANGES SINCE 1900.
page.content: cannot afford the very high cost of homes.Asthese are the people to really appreciate and understand true village life,there has been a most noticeable decline in the general interests of this village and its past activities and customs.Sadly,Abberley parish <with its small population of about 550> is rapidly changing in all ways.So many home interests are now found well away from the village. Fortunately the beauty of the country- side all around the village is the same as the past,may it remain so well into the future.
